member.name: D2D1_FIGURE_BEGIN
member.summary: Indicates whether a specific figure is filled or hollow.

member.name: D2D1_FIGURE_BEGIN.D2D1_FIGURE_BEGIN_FILLED
member.summary: Indicates the figure will be filled by the FillGeometry (or ) method.

member.name: D2D1_FIGURE_BEGIN.D2D1_FIGURE_BEGIN_HOLLOW
member.summary: Indicates the figure will not be filled by the FillGeometry (or ) method and will only consist of an outline. Moreover, the bounds of a hollow figure are zero. D2D1_FIGURE_BEGIN_HOLLOW should be used for stroking, or for other geometry operations.
